# Fire Shield, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Fire Spells|fire]] or [[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Warmage Spells|Warmage 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Targets:** One or more allied creatures, no two of which are more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 92

*With a few frenzied motions you complete the spell, bathing your allies in halos of magical flame.*

This spell functions like *[[Fire Shield (Spell)|fire shield]]*, except as noted above.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Warmage 5 to Level per Complete Arcane.
